# MTLGPUFamily.macCatalyst1

**Case**

Represents a family 1 Mac GPU when running an app you built with Mac Catalyst.

## Declaration

```swift
case macCatalyst1
```

## Checking for Mac Catalyst family GPU support

- **MTLGPUFamily.macCatalyst2**: Represents a family 2 Mac GPU when running an app you built with Mac Catalyst.
